about_the_game:
In Hoofobia, the dominance hierarchy is flipped on its head. Stalk the human hunter, strategize with other deer friends, make coordinated assaults on the hunter to knock him over, and finally escape his proximity forcefield before being brutally shot in order to earn a point for the deer team. In order to stay on his feet, the hunter must be more keenly aware than an NFL Linebacker or a Brazilian Spider Monkey, keeping his head on a swivel and closely listening for sneaky deer.


Play multiple game modes with many more coming soon!

Imposter Hunt: Blend in among the deer herd, knock over the hunter, and make him go insane.

Stay Close: Stay Hidden within the hunters proximity to earn points for the deer team.


Hit and Run: Knock over the hunter and escape his proximity bubble to earn a point.


Join global matchmaking lobbies that include 4 players per match and multiple game modes.

content_descriptors.notes: Hoofobia includes hunting and shooting Deer which includes blood. There is no human death or blood included in the game. The hunter character includes periodic cuss words and cussing when knocked over.

short_description: Hoofobia is the goofy deer VS hunter PVP with up to 4 players. When playing as deer, use stealth & strategy to sneak around vast forests and attack the lone hunter in order to escape his proximity without becoming a wall decoration.
